entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 19 at 5:34AM AKST until February 20 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Expect wind chills to range from 40 below zero to 59 below zero. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast.
